front.title: The Tao of the IETF: A Guide for New Attendees of the Internet Engineering Task Force

abstract.t: The purpose of this For Your Information (FYI) RFC is to explain to the newcomers how the IETF works. This will give them a warm, fuzzy feeling and enable them to make the meeting more productive for everyone. This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard.
